name: RotoTap
description:
Update promotion: FREE for a limited time!

The rules are simple: Read the word in the center of the circle and tap that color.
Sounds simple? You'll be surprised at how challenging it is.

You score 10 points plus a bonus for each correct tap, but you have to be quick.
The bonus drops quickly to 0 if you wait too long. You also get additional time added for every correct tap. If you tap the wrong color a time penalty is taken.
